overview: After taking over a failing Miami hotel with her workaholic fianc√©, Elliot, Tracy thinks Liza has seduced her better half-to-be. She then tries to have an affair of her own, and arranges for hookers to become bellhops. Meanwhile, her rich daddy hires an inept arsonist to blow up the place.
tagline: Where Sex and Laughter Run Riot
title: The Rosebud Beach Hotel
